title: In - Game Issues please help
body: When i get into a game, my graphics flicker and it is honestly unplayable. Can someone please tell me how i could stop the flickering it would be greatly appreciated. Ive uninstalled League, updated driver, initiated a full repair, honestly everything you can think of and it still does it. Please help

replies.body: You had a few good first steps by checking for driver updates and a repair, as it seems like this is some kind of bad interaction between League and your graphics hardware. Let's take a step further by double checking the rest of the steps in this [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) just in case. Let me know if that's still not working though!
